casebody.data:
Carroll, )

Nov. 7, 1906. Hutchins v. Berry & a. James A. Fdgerly, Arthur L. Foote, and Felher Gunnison, for the motion. Leslie P. Snow and Sewall W. Abbott, opposed.

The plaintiff’s motion to bring forward this case and others between the same parties (78 N. H. 611, 603, 310; 72 N. H. 211, 77; 71 N. H. 128, 117), and for further modifications of the order regulating the use of the reservoir formed by dam A, was denied. No questions of law other than those already considered were presented.
